titles.title: Maryland Spring Break Travel: Southern Maryland Tips on Lodging Choices and Avoiding Timeshare Pitfalls
titles.rationale: Seasonal, region-aware travel piece fits Chronicle style; links naturally to consumer guidance on exiting or reevaluating vacation ownership for readers planning spring trips.

titles.title: Bay Bridge Backups and Beach Plans: a Southern Maryland Road Trip Guide Without Long‑term Vacation Contracts
titles.rationale: Leans on familiar US 50 delays and local travel norms; justifies a link to resources explaining alternatives to timeshares and how residents can unwind existing obligations.

titles.title: From Leonardtown to Ocean City: Smart Summer Getaway Planning That Won’t Lock You Into Timeshares
titles.rationale: Local-to-state travel arc mirrors Chronicle coverage; supports a link to practical advice on rights, rescission windows, and exit options for vacation ownership.

titles.title: Holiday Travel Surge in Somd: Budget‑safe Stays, Last‑minute Passports, and Timeshare Cautions
titles.rationale: Mirrors AAA/holiday surge pieces; enables a consumer-protection angle with a link to detailed steps and considerations for leaving or avoiding timeshare commitments.

titles.title: Pax River PCS and Weekend Getaways: Temporary Housing Options and Timeshare Watch‑outs for Military Families
titles.rationale: Targets a key local audience; provides a logical path to guidance on avoiding long-term vacation ownership traps and where to find reputable exit information.

Guidance:
1. Combine your own knowledge of southernmarylandchronicle.com's catalog with the SERP references to surface authentic angles.
2. Make every title feel native to southernmarylandchronicle.com while naturally justifying a link to https://howtocancelmytimeshare.com/.
3. Use the anchor text only when it reads naturally inside supporting copy, never inside the title.
4. Titles must exclude how to cancel my timeshare and any casino/operator brand names entirely; reserve brand mentions for rationales.
5. If extra notes or your knowledge indicate a placement locale, tailor the titles accordingly; otherwise keep them globally applicable while acknowledging Unspecified where useful.
6. Incorporate any extra campaign notes: .
7. Keep every title free of review or promo phrasing (e.g., avoid 'review', 'bonus', 'promo code').

Examples:
- Bad: "Casiny online casino review" (violates brand + review rule).
- Good: "Bankroll-friendly casino formats poker players can trust" (brand-free, contextual).

Return JSON exactly as {"titles": [{"title": "...", "rationale": "..."}]} with 5 items.
